籤詩版本二:
Pfuma inokosha uye pfuma zvakavigwa mukati.Nei uchifanira kutsvaga jade kubva kunze?
Zviri nani kumirira huchenjeri hwemurume akachenjera uye uve wakasununguka.
詩意:
Iyi hexagram inovanza mufananidzo unowanikwa mujade.
Zvose zvinogona kuitwa nenguva yakafanira.
解曰: Iine goridhe uye jade. Hauzivi chekutsvagira. Sangana nenhungamiro yako. Hapana chikonzero chekunetseka.
籤詩故事一:
◇Ruma goridhe uye bhadhara zvakanaka
Cheng Yaojin ndiye aiva baba vekutanga veTang Dynasty.Rimwe zuva, Rengui akanga akarara zvake mumakomo.Pakarepo akawana Yaojin achimhanyiswa nengwe paaipfuura.Rengui akamubata, akakuvadza ingwe, uye akaponesa Yaojin. .
Yaojin akayemura martial arts aRengui, akamupa museve weJinling, ndokumukumbira kupinda muchiuto.
Xue Rengui akazove mukuru weTang Dynasty.
聖意: Namatira imba yako nekuchengeteka kwako, namatira pfuma yako, uye kumirira kuti muchato wako uenderere mberi.Varume vanofamba netsoka muLiujia vanovharira minda, makonye ane hafu, uye zvipfuyo zvitanhatu zviri kubudirira.Vari kutsvaga vanhu. , zvebasa, nematare edzimhosva.Kutama chinhu chakanaka uye chakarasika.Zvirwere zvekuchamhembe zvinosangana navanachiremba vakanaka.Makuva emakomo anofanira kuchinjwa.
